  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_884</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_884</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Estadística</string>
            <string language="en">Statistics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Statistiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Statistics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Statistiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στατιστικές</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los conceptos de la estadística descriptiva unidimensional. Se estudian los principales parámetros de centralización y de dispersión, con simulaciones gráficas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the main concepts in one-dimensional descriptive statistics. It studies the main parameters of central tendency and statistical dispersion with graphical simulations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">centralización</string>
            <string language="en">central tendency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">estadística</string>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">dispersión</string>
            <string language="en">dispersion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">descriptiva</string>
            <string language="en">descriptive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">unidimensional</string>
            <string language="en">one-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parámetros</string>
            <string language="en">parameters</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Hauptkonzepte in den eindimensionalen beschreibenden
Statistiken zu erklären. Sie studiert die Hauptparameter der 
zentralen Tendenz und der statistischen Zerstreuung mit graphischen 
Simulationen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer les concepts principaux dans des statistiques 
descriptives unidimensionnelles. Elle étudie les paramètres 
principaux de la tendance centrale et de la dispersion statistique 
avec des simulations graphiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
os conceitos principais em statistics descritivos one-dimensional. 
Estuda os parâmetros principais da tendência central e da 
dispersão estatística com simulações gráficas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare i concetti principali nelle statistiche descrittive 
unidimensionali. Studia i parametri principali di tendenza 
centrale e di dispersione statistica con le simulazioni grafiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τις βασικές έννοιες στις μονοδιάστατες 
περιγραφικές στατιστικές. Μελετά τις βασικές παραμέτρους 
της κεντρικής τάσης και της στατιστικής διασποράς με τις γραφικές
προσομοιώσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zentrale Tendenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerstreuung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eindimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tendance centrale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dispersion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">descriptif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unidimensionnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paramètres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tendência central</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dispersão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descritivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
